articles.content: "Edward Lodewijk Van Halen was a virtuoso, innovator, intergalactic legend," declares a respectful Jawa, a native of Tatooine, in the opening moments of this glorious online tribute to the late Dutch… [+1514 chars]

articles.title: The Sundance Film Festival makes a giant leap into VR - Engadget
articles.description: Anyone can access Sundance's VR platform by picking up a $25 Explorer Pass (or one of the festival's more premium passes), and logging onto a website. It's one area I hope Sundance expands on in the future. Overall, Sundance has 14 New Frontier exhibitions th…
articles.content: Over at the New Frontier Gallery, every VR/AR/mixed media exhibition was on display like a work of art. Stepping up to an individual piece brings up an explanation as well as the requirements for vie… [+848 chars]
